title: who can save my account?
body: somebody hacked my account.i cant even log in to my account now.this is the one who haced my account s email probably *****ujia@163.com

replies.body: Oooooo that's not good! Reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as you can and they should be able to help out once you can confirm you are the original creator of the account. They'll also be able to repair any damage, so no worries there!
